channel.title: How to make myself owner on czar..what do i type on client.java
channel.description: ok..i just made a server but i aint owner..on client java wat do i type...like where do i find place that says who owner and all that shit..plz help

item.title: How to make myself owner on czar..what do i type on client.java
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

search up the existing Owner on replace and then replace it with yours

Read full topic
item.source: How to make myself owner on czar..what do i type on client.java

item.title: How to make myself owner on czar..what do i type on client.java
item.dc:creator: @zezima252 zezima252
item.description:
@zezima252 wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:8, topic:201303”][quote author=zezima252 link=topic=265971.msg2198365#msg2198365 date=1208617245]

[quote author=dragonchain link=topic=265971.msg2198354#msg2198354 date=1208616670]

go to characters>zezima252 then it will say character-rights = 0, change it to character-rights = 3 and then go to data>administrators and add your name.

well…i went to client.java and clicked ctrl+f and typed characters…and didnt have wat u said
[/quote]characters is a file in your server folder

aint there…ill check again…remember this is a project czar
[/quote]You think I don’t know what czar is, it’s popular for it’s retardness

lol ok…but now i need to give it silab items…defenders r in the shop but i cant spawn anything like a godsword…it still got ::pickup 0995 or ::pickup 4532…it only got 4 digits…how can i get it to have 5

You have to have both of the pickup codes, here they are, you need them both, replace them with your old pickup command:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zezima252") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zezima252")))) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { } } if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { } }[/quote]
where do i add that??..do i copy and paste it somewhere?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make myself owner on czar..what do i type on client.java

item.title: How to make myself owner on czar..what do i type on client.java
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“zezima252, post:7, topic:201303”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=265971.msg2198354#msg2198354 date=1208616670]

[quote author=zezima252 link=topic=265971.msg2198351#msg2198351 date=1208616526]

go to characters>zezima252 then it will say character-rights = 0, change it to character-rights = 3 and then go to data>administrators and add your name.

well…i went to client.java and clicked ctrl+f and typed characters…and didnt have wat u said
[/quote]characters is a file in your server folder

aint there…ill check again…remember this is a project czar
[/quote]You think I don’t know what czar is, it’s popular for it’s retardness

lol ok…but now i need to give it silab items…defenders r in the shop but i cant spawn anything like a godsword…it still got ::pickup 0995 or ::pickup 4532…it only got 4 digits…how can i get it to have 5[/quote]
You have to have both of the pickup codes, here they are, you need them both, replace them with your old pickup command:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zezima252") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zezima252")))) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { } } if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { } }
